EmailTemplate.name: TBoM_Alert_RM_CA for RegBdays crossing 25 days
EmailTemplate.subject: Immediate Attention Required - Reg B Compliance - Credit Decision Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
The following Loan application is reaching 30 days since the Application Complete Date. Please submit the loan to Credit immediately for a formal credit decision to be rendered. If the loan is in Credit already, please communicate with the Credit Officer to reach a decision. Contact your Team Leader or Compliance Officer directly with any questions.
{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Link}
Thank you!
